translation.en: [man over intercom] Number one, step forward and face the mirror.
translation.es: Número uno,un paso adelante y mire al espejo.

translation.en: Have another look at this one, ma'am…
We're talking about violent killings. Murder, ma'am.
translation.es: Se trata de asesinatos violentos.Asesinato, señora.

translation.en: Is this not the woman you saw?
translation.es: ¿Esta no es la mujer que vio?

translation.en: Zenzi. Do you… Do you mind if I call you Zenzi?
You've had quite a week, huh?
A trail of bodies all over the damn city.
translation.es: Un reguero de cuerpos por toda la ciudad.

translation.en: Dead criminals falling from the sky.
Why did you murder these men?
Eyewitnesses, CCTV cameras, they put you on the scene.
translation.es: Hay testigos y cámarasque te ponen en la escena del crimen.

translation.en: What the hell are you mixed up in?

translation.es: Soy una simple empleada de limpieza.

translation.en: So, how's the little guy doing?
-[Zenzi] Who said it was a guy? -I can feel it. I'm sure it's a guy.
translation.es: - ¿Quién dijo que era varón?- Lo presiento. Estoy seguro.

translation.en: Morning, Mr. Booysen. What have I told you? Call me Enrico.
translation.es: - Buen día, Sr. Booysen.- ¿Qué te dije? Llámame Enrico.

translation.en: I'm your landlord, but I'm also a friend.
translation.es: Soy tu casero, pero también tu amigo.

translation.en: I'll make up the rent. Please.
translation.es: Le pagaré la renta. Por favor.

translation.en: You know I'm here to help, na?
translation.es: Sabes que cuentas con mi ayuda.

translation.en: If we need to put our heads together and, uh, make a plan.
translation.es: Si lo necesitas,podemos elaborar un plan juntos.

translation.en: I just don't want to see you out on the street.
translation.es: No quiero verte en la calle.

translation.en: And without a man to protect you.
translation.es: Y sin un hombre que te proteja.

translation.en: -Good. Maybe now I'll see my money. -[door opens]
translation.es: Bien. Quizá ahora reciba mi dinero.

translation.en: [woman in Afrikaans] Enrico! Where are you?
Ma'am, did you remember that today-- You didn't forget to collect Summer, did you, Zenzi?
translation.es: - Señora, ¿recuerda que hoy…?- No olvidaste recoger a Summer, ¿verdad?

translation.en: Oh! I did. I did. I did. Oh.
[boy in Tswana] It's for Papa when you take me to visit him. You promised.
translation.es: Es para papá cuando me lleves a verlo.Lo prometiste.

translation.en: I need to leave a bit early today.
translation.es: Hoy tengo que irme un poco antes.

translation.en: Come on, he put you through so much.
translation.es: Por favor, él te hizo sufrir mucho.

translation.en: Sometimes it's best to leave our past behind us.
translation.es: A veces, es mejor dejar el pasado atrás.

translation.en: Hello, sir. I'm here to fetch my husband, Maxwell Mwale.
translation.es: Hola, señor. Vengo a buscara mi esposo, Maxwell Mwale.

translation.en: -[pounding on door] -[Zenzi] Okay, okay, I'm coming.
Max Mwale, you're under arrest for the murder of Yazid Noordien.
translation.es: Maxwell Mwale, queda arrestadopor el asesinato de Yazid Noordien.

translation.en: -[in Tswana] What's going on? -[in English] I love you.
-[in English] Move it! -This is a mistake. Wait.
Who are you waiting for, sister?
He was supposed to be released today at 5:00.
translation.es: Iban a liberarlo hoy a las 5:00.

translation.en: It says here he was released this morning.
translation.es: Aquí dice que lo liberaron esta mañana.

translation.en: [scoffs] No. [guard] I don't know what to tell you.

translation.es: Tu esposo es un hombre libre.

translation.en: [whispering] Zenzi, do you know what time it is?
-Is this a joke? -No. No. He got out today. But he's not home.
translation.es: - ¿Es una broma?- No. Salió hoy, pero no está en casa.

translation.en: Well, if I saw him, I would chase him away unless he brings the rent.
translation.es: Si lo viera, lo ahuyentaríaa menos que traiga la renta.

translation.en: Anyway, you're better off without him. Count yourself lucky.
Did Enrico tell you? We're selling the house.
translation.es: ¿Enrico te lo dijo?Vamos a vender la casa.

translation.en: We don't have a choice anymore.
You're gonna have to find somewhere else to live for free.
translation.es: Búscate otro lugar donde vivir gratis.

translation.en: You've got till the end of the month to pack up your things.
translation.es: Tienes hasta fin de mespara empacar tus cosas.

translation.en: [Zenzi] I'd like to report a missing person, please.
[in Afrikaans] Ay. It's these Zimbabweans again.
The husband is off with his mistress, and the wife comes to us to find him.
translation.es: El esposo se va con su amantey la esposa viene a buscarlo.

translation.en: -[in English] Cry me a river. -[police officers laugh]
I am not Zimbabwean. I'm from Bethlehem in the Free State.
translation.es: No soy zimbabuense.Soy de Belén, en Free State.

translation.en: And my husband is not with some mistress.
translation.es: Y mi esposo no está con una amante.

translation.en: He got out of jail today. He was supposed to come home, but he didn't.
translation.es: Salió de prisión hoy.Debía volver a casa y no vino.

translation.en: So are you going to help me or not?
Look, these men are trouble, sister.
He's probably out drinking with friends, having a good time.
translation.es: Debe estar bebiendo con amigosy pasándola bien.
Tal vez estás mejor sin él.

translation.en: Don't leave a voicemail. Just text me. Thanks, bye.
translation.es: No dejes mensajes de voz.Solo escríbeme. Gracias, adiós.

translation.en: Hi. I'm looking for this guy,
translation.es: Hola. Estoy buscando a este hombre.

translation.en: I'm looking for this guy. Have you seen him? Max.
translation.es: Hola. Estoy buscando a este hombre.¿Lo has visto? Max.
Espera. - ¿Conoces a Max?- Está en la cárcel.
- ¿Conoces a Max?- Está en la cárcel.

translation.en: -No, no, he got out. -Well, he's not here.
translation.es: - No, lo liberaron.- Pues aquí no está.

translation.en: You need a new man to warm your bed, eh? [chuckles]
Well, if Max isn't in jail, he's dead.
translation.es: Si Max no está en la cárcel, está muerto.

translation.en: So fuck him. And fuck you!
translation.es: Así que a la mierda con él. ¡Y contigo!

translation.en: What are you playing, coming here?
I was just trying to find my husband.
He wasn't at the prison, and he didn't come home.
translation.es: No estaba en la cárcel y no volvió a casa.

translation.en: I don't know where to look anymore.
[sighs] No one will help me. I will help you.
translation.es: - Nadie me ayudará.- Yo te ayudaré.

translation.en: I… I really need to get home.
I should fix that door for you.
translation.es: Puedo arreglar esa puerta por ti.

translation.en: Oh, no, it's okay. I'm already used to it.
-[Enrico] Zenzi, open the door. -[banging on door]
[Enrico] Zenzi, I'm just trying to help you.
[Alice in Afrikaans] Enrico! Leave that bloody maid, before I put you both on the street!
translation.es: ¡Enrico! ¡Deja a esa maldita sirvientaantes de que los eche a los dos!

translation.en: No wonder he's not coming back. Anything to get away from you.
translation.es: Ya veo por qué él no volvió.Hará lo que sea para alejarse de ti.

translation.en: You do realize that if you are lying, not only are you in contempt of court,
translation.es: Sabe que, si miente, no solo incurreen desacato ante el tribunal,

translation.en: but you're leaving the real criminals on the street?
translation.es: sino que liberaráa los verdaderos criminales ¿no?
Después de todo lo que hice,

translation.en: [in Tswana] I am your wife, Max.
I know who you really are.
[in Tswana] Then maybe this is my chance to change.
[in English] What is it you're not telling me?
What are you involved in? Please, whatever it is…
translation.es: ¿En qué estás metido? Sea lo que sea…

translation.en: I thought it was somebody important.
If living in your own filth is so important, I can leave.
translation.es: Si vivir en su propia mugrees tan importante, puedo irme.

translation.en: [groans] Well, you did come all this way.
I see you have been writing.
It's juice. I know what's good for me.
translation.es: Es jugo. Sé lo que me conviene.

translation.en: After a week-long search led by local police,
translation.es: Tras una semana de búsquedapor parte de la policía,

translation.en: Garth's body was ultimately recovered near a stream in Philippi.
translation.es: El cuerpo de Garthfue hallado junto a un arroyo en Philippi.

translation.en: With me today are his daughter, Melanie, and wife, Karen,
translation.es: Hoy me acompañansu hija, Melanie, y su esposa, Karen,

translation.en: who are recounting their harrowing journey in their hopes of finding justice…
translation.es: que compartirán su desgarradora odiseaen busca de justicia.

translation.en: [in Tswana] It's no Felicia, but it hits the spot.
translation.es: No es Felicia, pero no está mal.

translation.en: [host on TV] And when did you know he wasn't coming home? That he was dead?
translation.es: …¿y cuándo supieronque no volvería a casa y que había muerto?

translation.en: [Melanie on TV] He hadn't called. He always called.
I just looked at my mom, and I knew.
translation.es: Solo miré a mi mamá… y lo supe.

translation.en: If you want to study humanity,
translation.es: Si quieres estudiar a la humanidad,

translation.en: you should watch daytime TV talk shows.
[host] You suspect there might be more to it. [Melanie] There has to be more to it.
translation.es: - Sospechas que podría haber algo más.- Tiene que haber más.

translation.en: He had enemies. We knew this.
-Please. Look at her. -It has to have been someone he knew.
translation.es: - Por favor. Mírala.- Debió ser alguien conocido.

translation.en: Well, when you have multiple awards for your investigative journalism,
translation.es: Cuando tengas múltiples premiosde periodismo investigativo

translation.en: and a Sunday Times bestseller, you can be the judge of character around here.
translation.es: y un best seller del Sunday Times,podrás analizar personalidades.

translation.en: Well, Mr. Ngesi, if I did not clean up after you,
translation.es: Bueno, señor Ngesi,si no limpiara su casa,

translation.en: I would think you were an arrogant ass.
translation.es: diría que es un idiota engreído.

translation.en: [in Tswana] There's no underestimating you, Zenzi.

translation.es: - Hoy no tenías que venir.- Lo sé.

translation.en: But I can't come in later this week.
translation.es: Pero no puedo más tarde esta semana.

translation.en: A-and I really need to speak to Mr. Hendricks.
translation.es: Y necesito hablar con el Sr. Hendricks.

translation.en: [Hendricks] I pay you to solve my problems. I don't pay you so I can solve my own problems. So fucking solve it.
translation.es: Te pago para que resuelvas mis problemaspor mí, así que resuélvelo.

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa, Zenzi, what the fuck are you doing here? What day is it?
translation.es: Zenzi, ¿qué mierda haces aquí?¿Qué día es hoy?

translation.en: Sorry, Mr. Hendricks. Nancy said I can work today.
translation.es: Perdone, Sr. Hendricks. Nancy me autorizó.

translation.en: Okay, but you're not supposed to see this shit.
translation.es: Bueno, pero no debías ver esta mierda.

translation.en: You can keep your mouth shut, right?
translation.es: - No abras la boca, ¿sí?- Sé lo que hace aquí, señor.

translation.en: I know what you do here, sir. I've worked here for a while now.
translation.es: - No abras la boca, ¿sí?- Sé lo que hace aquí, señor. - Hace tiempo que trabajo aquí.- Ya sé.

translation.en: Yeah, I know. I know. Just… [grumbles]
translation.es: - Hace tiempo que trabajo aquí.- Ya sé.

translation.en: …mind your own business and clean something.
translation.es: Ocúpate de tus asuntos y limpia algo.

translation.en: "Keep it away from Zenzi. Just let her clean."
translation.es: "Que Zenzi se limite a limpiar".Es lo que pidió Max.

translation.en: That's all Max asked for. What the fuck am I supposed to do?
translation.es: "Que Zenzi se limite a limpiar".Es lo que pidió Max. ¿Qué carajo voy a hacer?

translation.en: Yes. Yes. Of course, sir. You've been good to us, sir.
translation.es: Sí. Claro, señor.Ha sido bueno con nosotros.

translation.en: Um, I've been meaning to ask, sir--
I can't give you another advance, Zenzi. I wish this was my money, but it's not.
translation.es: No puedo darte otro adelanto.Ojalá este dinero fuera mío, pero no.

translation.en: -Max is in jail. -No, he got out.
Nobody fucking told me. Somebody's getting cut up for this.
translation.es: Nadie me dijo un carajo.Alguien tendrá problemas por esto.

translation.en: You know Max is welcome here, right? So where the fuck is he?
translation.es: Sabes que Max es bienvenido aquí, ¿no?¿Dónde rayos está?

translation.en: That's what I'm asking you, sir.
I went to fetch him yesterday, but…
translation.es: Ayer fui a buscarlo a la cárcel,

translation.en: he wasn't there. I… I… I can't find him.
translation.es: pero no estaba allí. No lo encuentro.

translation.en: you and me, we need to find Max.
translation.es: Tú y yo debemos encontrar a Max.

translation.en: There's a lot of shit happening out there, okay? A lot of unfinished business.
translation.es: Están pasando muchas cosas.Hay muchos asuntos pendientes.

translation.en: And would, uh, would Jackson know?
Jackson Thom is no partner of mine, okay? He's a fucking sociopath.
translation.es: Jackson Thom no es mi socio.Es un maldito sociópata.

translation.en: Stay away from him. He's dangerous. And Max owes him money.
translation.es: Aléjate de él. Es peligroso.Y Max le debe dinero.

translation.en: And if Jackson knows Max is out, that is a bad move for Max.
translation.es: Y si sabe que Max está libre,Max está en peligro.

translation.en: You and me, we're gonna stay far away from Jackson. You hear me?
translation.es: Tú y yo nos mantendremos lejos de Jackson.¿Me hago entender?

translation.en: Those fuckers moved on us. Jackson's guys.
translation.es: La gente de Jackson nos atacó.

translation.en: You… You get out of here, okay?
Leave it with me. I'll find Max.
-[Hendricks] Where the fuck is Joseph? -[man] We don't know. He wasn't there.
translation.es: - Hasta la otra semana.- ¿Y Joseph? No sabemos. No estaba.

translation.en: Do you know where I can find Jackson Thom? It's important.
translation.es: ¿Dónde puedo encontrar a Jackson Thom?Es importante.

translation.en: -[injured man grunting] -[Hendricks] Bite on this. Bite! Fuck.
translation.es: Muerde esto. ¡Muerde! - Mierda.- Nancy, por favor.

translation.en: Do you remember that night when I told Bevan that you were with me?
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas cuando le dije a Bevanque estabas conmigo?

translation.en: Yeah, the boss is over there.
translation.es: Sí, el jefe está por allá.

translation.en: Am I supposed to know you? Who sent you?
What do you do? Clean his toilets?
You're Max's little wife. You don't need to answer. I know that.
translation.es: Eres la mujer de Max.No hace falta que respondas. Lo sé.

translation.en: It's my business to know things.

translation.es: Max estaba mejor en la cárcel.

translation.en: I've been sitting here, waiting for him to knock on my door.
translation.es: Llevo tiempo aquí sentadoesperando que venga.

translation.en: am I going to need collateral?
if collateral didn't just walk into my workshop.
translation.es: si la garantíaacaba de entrar en mi taller.

translation.en: -It has nothing to do with me. -Oh, that's where you're wrong.
translation.es: - Yo no tengo nada que ver.- Te equivocas.

translation.en: It's got everything to do with you.
Until Max pays me, whatever's Max's is mine.
translation.es: Hasta que Max me pague,todo lo suyo es mío.

translation.en: And I might as well enjoy it.
[Zenzi] Don't come closer. I'll… I'll just leave.
No, no, no, no, no, no. No. [shakily] No, no.
You were right. The daughter killed her father.
translation.es: Tenías razón. La hija mató a su padre.

translation.en: I don't know how you knew it, but you hit the nail right on the head.
translation.es: No sé cómo lo hiciste,pero diste justo en el clavo.

translation.en: Well, actually, I wanted to speak to you about a new idea for a book.
translation.es: En realidad, quería hablartesobre una idea para un nuevo libro.

translation.en: [sighs] Maybe better when you get here.
I think you're actually gonna like this one.
translation.es: Creo que esta te va a gustar.

translation.en: [inhales sharply] I'll call you later, okay?
Just drop by when you get the--
[Mr. Ngesi] What do we really know about the invisible women in our lives?
translation.es: ¿Qué sabemos realmente sobrelas mujeres invisibles en nuestras vidas?

translation.en: sweep our floors, know us better than we know ourselves,
translation.es: barren nuestros pisos,nos conocen mejor que nosotros mismos,

translation.en: sometimes more than we'd like to admit.
translation.es: a veces más de lo que quisiéramos admitir.

translation.en: How often do we reach out into their lives
translation.es: ¿Con qué frecuencianos acercamos a sus vidas

translation.en: the way they seamlessly move in and out of ours?
translation.es: tal como ellasentran y salen de la nuestra?

translation.en: Do we dare to look outside of our self-involved lives?
translation.es: ¿Nos atrevemos a mirarmás allá de nuestras vidas egoístas?

translation.en: But one momentary interaction can remind even an aging narcissist
translation.es: Una interacción momentánea puederecordarle incluso a un viejo narcisista

translation.en: that there's life outside of our own.
translation.es: que hay vida fuera de la nuestra.

translation.en: I want to write a new story.
translation.es: Quiero escribir una nueva historia. NADA ESPECIAL

translation.en: The story of a woman, softly-spoken, unremarkable
translation.es: La historia de una mujer,de voz suave, nada especial,

translation.en: but with a dignity of strength I haven't often seen,
translation.es: pero con una fuerza de dignidadque pocas veces he visto,

translation.en: who's taken knock after knock but finds the strength to get back up,
translation.es: que recibe golpe tras golpe, pero siempre encuentrala fuerza para levantarse.

translation.en: a woman I'd like to call a friend.
translation.es: Una mujer a la que quisiera llamar amiga,

translation.en: To a younger man, maybe even more.
translation.es: o incluso algo máspara un hombre más joven.

translation.en: Who's seen the worst of heartbreak, but who has resolved to live,
translation.es: Quien ha vivido el más profundo dolor,pero está resuelta a vivir.

translation.en: to live with the best of hearts and make the right decisions, always.
translation.es: Vivir con el mejor de los corazonesy tomar las decisiones correctas, siempre.

translation.en: [Mr. Ngesi] What will happen to this woman
when the world around her is in chaos…
translation.es: cuando el mundo que la rodea colapse?

translation.en: [Hendricks] Quick! Get those boxes out of here.
[Mr. Ngesi] …when her limits are tested, her principles,
translation.es: ¿Cuando sus límites y principiossean puestos a prueba?

translation.en: when her back is against the wall?
translation.es: ¿Cuando esté entre la espada y la pared?

translation.en: -Then we'll see who she really is. -[Hendricks] You, hurry up!
translation.es: Entonces, veremos quién es en realidad.

translation.en: Zenzi, this is not a good time.
Nancy, move it. This is the first place they're gonna come to.
translation.es: Nancy, muévete.Aquí es donde primero vendrán.

translation.en: They're coming right fucking now. Twenty minutes max. Wipe the drives.
translation.es: Ya vienen, carajo.En menos de 20 minutos. Borra los discos.

translation.en: Joseph, you take the car and get out of here.
translation.es: Joseph, toma el auto y vete.

translation.en: If they're gonna search this place, the only thing they're gonna find
translation.es: Si vienen aquí, lo único que encontraránson cortes de la mejor carne, ¿entiendes?

translation.en: is the finest cuts of tomahawk steaks, you get me?
translation.es: lo único que encontraránson cortes de la mejor carne, ¿entiendes?

translation.en: You shouldn't be here right now.
Okay, motherfuckers, move it! It's day zero!
translation.es: ¡Muévanse, hijos de puta! ¡Es el día cero!

translation.en: The guy you came to ask about just a few hours ago, he's dead.
translation.es: El tipo por el que vinistea preguntar hace un rato está muerto.

translation.en: But somehow I get the feeling you already know that, don't you?
translation.es: Pero, de algún modo,presiento que ya lo sabes, ¿no?

translation.en: The whole fucking city's gonna think that I did it and with my own gun.
translation.es: Todos pensarán que yo lo hice,y con mi propia arma.

translation.en: And don't you say a fucking word, you got me?
translation.es: Y no abras la puta boca, ¿entiendes?

translation.en: Uys and Van der Merwe, I want you in there. Thorough checks, okay?
translation.es: Uys y Van Der Merwe, los quiero ahí.Revisen bien, ¿sí?

translation.en: Twala, Bennett, that side. Even the freezers.
translation.es: Twala, Bennett, por ese lado.Hasta los congeladores.

translation.en: You, I want you in there.
Check hard drives, files, boxes, computers…
Come on. The rest follow me.
I want you on that side. Bring me anything significant.
translation.es: Ve por ese lado. Tráeme algo que sirva.

translation.en: You sure no one followed you?
[Joseph] Got out just in time, I guess.
-What's going on, boss? -[Hendricks] I wish I fucking knew.
-Somehow Max is right in the middle of it. -Max?
translation.es: - No sé, pero Max está en el medio.- ¿Max?
Él y la perra de su mujer.

translation.en: She took my gun and some cash, and now Jackson is dead.
translation.es: Se llevó mi arma y mi dinero,y ahora Jackson está muerto.

translation.en: Everyone is gonna think it was us.
[Blessing on phone] You've really fucked things up now, huh?
translation.es: Ahora sí metiste la pata hasta el fondo.

translation.en: What part of "keep the peace" don't you motherfuckers understand?
translation.es: ¿Qué parte de "mantener la paz"no entienden, hijos de puta?

translation.en: [Blessing] Yes, you are. Come and see me.
You were at Raymond Hendricks's business earlier today.
translation.es: Hoy estuviste en el negociode Raymond Hendricks.

translation.en: even though it wasn't my day to work.
translation.es: Aunque no era mi día de trabajo,

translation.en: I was going because I was trying to find my husband.
translation.es: Fui porque buscaba a mi esposo.

translation.en: Mr. Hendricks couldn't help me either.
translation.es: El Sr. Hendricks tampoco pudo ayudarme.

translation.en: I don't know why I took it.
translation.es: No sé por qué lo tomé.

translation.en: I wasn't even thinking. I was just trying to find Max.
translation.es: Fue algo instintivo,solo intentaba encontrar a Max.

translation.en: [detective] We have reason to believe Raymond's involved in organized criminal activity.
translation.es: Tenemos razones para creer que Raymondes parte del crimen organizado.

translation.en: Did you see any drugs at the butchery or weapons?
translation.es: ¿Viste drogas o armas en la carnicería?
Solo soy una empleada de limpieza.

translation.en: Does the name "Jackson Thom" mean anything to you?
[detective] He was found dead today, and we think it was a gangland hit.
translation.es: Apareció muerto hoy,y creemos que fue un golpe mafioso.

translation.en: We think your husband could be involved.
When's the last time you saw him?
[detective] Do you perhaps have a recent photograph of him?
[Zenzi] Do you know where I can find Jackson Thom?
If you hear from your husband,
translation.es: Si sabes algo de tu esposo,

translation.en: if you see him, if you can think of anything,
translation.es: si lo ves, si se te ocurre algo,

translation.en: I can help you out of a scene you don't want to be any part of.
translation.es: puedo ayudarte a salirde un mundo del que no quieres ser parte.

translation.en: Are you gonna tell me what happened?
We cannot have that type of disruption happening here.
translation.es: No podemos tolerarinterrupciones de ese tipo.

translation.en: If you are involved in something, we cannot have it.
translation.es: Si estás metida en algo raro,no podemos tolerarlo.

translation.en: And I'm not involved in anything.
translation.es: Y no estoy metida en nada.

translation.en: you've gotta stand up for yourself.
I am not a killer for hire.
[man] So far so good, I say.
translation.es: Lo has hecho bien hasta ahora.

translation.en: [man] Do it, and you get paid for your trouble.
translation.es: Si lo haces, se te pagará.

translation.en: …and the police might learn who really pulled the trigger on Jackson Thom.
translation.es: la policía sabráquién le disparó a Jackson Thom.

translation.en: They will believe it's Max. My husband is not a murderer.
translation.es: - Creerán que fue Max.- Él no es un asesino.

translation.en: He should've taken the money and done the time like he was told. But Max…
translation.es: Max debió tomar el dineroy cumplir la condena como se le dijo.

translation.en: Max had to fuck around with the wrong people.
translation.es: Pero se metió con la gente equivocada.

translation.en: Who did Max take the fall for?
[man] All you need to know is
if Max hadn't stepped out of line, your son would still be alive.
translation.es: es que tu hijo aún viviríasi Max no se hubiera pasado de la raya.

translation.en: The boy didn't have to die. It's all Max's fault.
translation.es: El niño no tenía que morir.Todo es culpa de Max.

translation.en: [announcer over PA system] The next train does not stop here.
translation.es: El próximo tren no para aquí.

translation.en: What happened to Esulu could easily happen--
translation.es: Lo que le pasó a Esulu podría pasarle…

translation.en: Did he even shed a tear when he found out his soft little son was dead?
translation.es: ¿Lloró aunque fuera un pocoal enterarse de la muerte de su pequeño?
